title: For relaxing garden views, come home to The Park At East Ponce!
posting_body: ['Community Location:', '1900 Tree Mountain Pkwy - Stone Mountain, GA 30083', 'Rental Information:', '$1390/Month | 1 Bedroom 1 Bath | 883 sq ft', 'Leasing Options:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'show contact info', 'Apartment Amenities:', '➢ Breakfast Bar', '➢ Cable Ready', '➢ Carpet', '➢ Ceiling Fans', '➢ Cozy Fireplaces', '➢ Dishwasher', '➢ Island Kitchens', '➢ Range w/Oven', '➢ Refrigerator', '➢ Sunrooms', '➢ Air Conditioning', '➢ Custom Cabinetry', '➢ Hardwood Flooring', '➢ Individual Climate Control', '➢ Newly Renovated Apartments', '➢ Roommate Floor Plans', '➢ Townhomes Available', '➢ Trash Compactor', '➢ Washer & Dryer Connections', '➢ Window Coverings', 'Property Features:', '➢ 24 Hour Availability', '➢ Accepts Credit Card Payments', '➢ Clubhouse', '➢ Community Laundry Room', '➢ Fitness Center', '➢ On-Site Maintenance', '➢ Playground', '➢ Storage', '➢ Walk to Bus Line', '➢ WI-FI Availability', '➢ Cardio & Fitness Center', '➢ Electronic Rent Payment', '➢ Fax/Copy Services', '➢ Green and Flowered Areas', '➢ Monthly Resident Events', '➢ On-Site Management', '➢ Resort Style Swimming Pool', '➢ Some Architectural Distinction', '➢ Trail, Bike, Hike, Jog', '➢', 'Well Maintained Grounds', 'Description:', 'We invite you to call us for more information or come by The Park at East Ponce Apartments and see why our residents love to call us home!', 'We look forward to showing you around our community.', 'Pets:', 'We welcome your pets for a maximum of 2 pets per apartment home.', 'Pet fee is $300.', '$15 Monthly Pet Fee.', 'Weight limit is 50 lbs.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Please call our leasing office for more information.', 'Call:', 'The Park At East Ponce at', 'show contact info', 'Facebook:', '<URL>', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Admin Fee: $135 - Non-Refundable', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '1173285F443B4DA']
